name: Ramen Cooking Game Adventure
description:
Do you love anime style games? Even if you don't you're going to love this one! Be a chef & cook ramen in Japan! There are so many different kinds of ramen with so many different ingredients. It would take a master ramen chef to learn & cook them all with ease. Fortunately you have the ability to look at the ingredients for the certain type of ramen that your customers will ask for. You'll need to get the ingredients right or your customers could end up leaving unhappy. The more ramen you make the better your shop will get & the more money you will receive for more & more upgrades & food!

Features:
- 180+ Levels
- 300+ different types of ramen
- Thousands of different combonations
- Many customers to serve & unlock
- Different area's to unlock
- Upgradable workbench
- Free to play + Much more!
